entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023
